text.section: Except as provided in § 11-516 of this subtitle, the takeout that a licensee deducts from the handle of a race shall be allocated in accordance with this section.

A licensee shall:
keep 50% of the breakage;
allocate 45% of the breakage for purses; and
allocate 5% of the breakage to the Maryland-Bred Race Fund.
